reviews.review_msg: Best teacher, she is so helpful especially on Vista.  You can tell you spends a good deal of time answering your questions as they are very thorough answers.
Very nice. Tries really hard to make sure everyone understands what is going on. It works. People get it.

Kimberly was a *GREAT* teacher. She took a conceptually difficult course and made it clear, accessible and fun. She genuinely wanted her students to succeed, and really worked hard to provide support on webCT and through office hours. A++++ to Kim.
The best instructor at UBC (teaches at UBC & SFU). Clear, interesting, funny, and super nice. You can tell that she really enjoys teaching and she is very good at it.
UBC summer course. Awesome prof. Clear, reasonable, helpful. Respectful towards students. Sets the bar high for other instructors. Highly recommended.
The smartest prof I had. Knows so much about so many different topics. Classes are really fun and assignments were really imaginative. She is a true inspiration!!!

She was so helpful and welcoming.  I'm sure she was bogged down by thousands of emails over the semester but she quickly answered every one of mine. I hope she does well as a prof and in whatever career she is in after!!
Kim is a really great prof. She presented topics really well, the assignments midterm and final were all fair, and she made herself really available for extra help.

Lectures clearly and in a straightforward manner. Kim is readily available outside of class and is extremely helpful when students have questions about how to do an assignment or lab. She also answers e-mails quickly and thoroughly.
